testcase.name: Verify Home page Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given I am in Daraz.com.bd..................................................passed And I want to view the logo in left top side................................passed And I want to view the search bar in mid....................................passed And There must be a search button next to search bar........................passed And Also I want to view cart option.........................................passed Then i want a category option...............................................passed And In Category there must be sixteen categories............................passed And In landing page, there must be twelve menus in left side and assert every category.passed When I want to pay,there must be shown five payment methods in the footer...passed And Internationally Daraz is available in five countries and shows in footer.passed
